version_description:
Gestures!
• Double tap to pause/play
• Swipe up/down for volume control
• iPad owners, we heard you: 2-finger expand/pinch to toggle fullscreen

Fixes.
• The Curious Case of Benjamin Button's Missing Movies (after updates) - Solved.
• Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Inability to Download - Much better now.

VUDU Player 4.0 - Completely rebuilt with new features and design:
• Faster, more responsive native UI
• Sort library alphabetically, by purchase date, or by release date
• Search My Movies & My TV
• View movie, season or episode details
• Play trailers

Tweaks & Fixin's
• Taught volume control gestures to play nicer with iOS.
• Permanently reprimanded the bug that prevents you from watching downloaded movies when you don't have WiFi, cellular data, or you know, happen to be in a Faraday cage.
• Put some ambitious TV bundles back in their place--i.e. not in the movies section.

VUDU Player 4.0 - Completely rebuilt with new features and design:
• Faster, more responsive native UI
• Search My Movies & My TV
• Gestures - Double-tap to pause/play; swipe up/down for volume control; 2-finger expand on iPad for full-screen
• Sort library alphabetically, by purchase date, or by release date
• View movie, season or episode details
• Play trailers

FEATURES ADDED
• Now you can browse the entire VUDU library and watch thousands of free trailers and bonus features. It sure beats catching up on wedding and baby news on Facebook.
• Auto-magic search suggestions on over 100K+ movies and TV shows, plus sort and filter by genre, date, reviews and more. For example, 1980’s Horror. Or 1980’s movies with <20% fresh rating on Rotten Tomatoes. Same diff.
• Add new releases and favorites to your wishlist. You can also manage your wishlist and collection on the VUDU website. You currently cannot purchase or rent titles via the app.

THE DEETS ON BUG FIXES*
• NO MORE RE-DOWNLOADS! Now you won’t have to redownload your movies and TV shows when you upgrade. Just stay connected to the Internet for a hot minute after updating so we can verify your downloads. Then airplane mode away.
• Background downloading fixed. You can now go back to watching paint dry and water boil.
• If you unplugged your headphones when watching, you might have experienced some playback errors. If you don’t watch with headphones on, you might be really annoying that person next to you on the train.
• Your finely tuned, fully-customized closed captioning settings now preview correctly.
• After an errant line of code accidentally put the ‘Pitch Perfect’ movie poster in place of ‘Taken’, our engineer got a really serious call that scared the bejeezus out of him. He is so, so, so, so, so, so, so sorry, Anna Kendrick.
• Killed some bugs that caused VUDU to crash during sign in and when viewing content.**

FEATURES PAST
• Gesture Controls – Double-tap to pause/play, swipe up/down for volume and 2-finger expand on iPad for full-screen
• Certified Chromecast Support – Because even the iPad Pro screen could be bigger. Cast to a TV and watch in full 1080p HDX glory.
• Closed Captioning Customization – We petitioned really hard to get Comic Sans as an option. Alas, to no avail.

*Oh hey that’s a pun!
**No actual real bugs were harmed in the making of this update. Several engineers, however, have been permanently scarred for life.

MAIN COURSE
• Introducing Spotlight: a purty new place to quickly find the best deals, collections, trailers, free TV and more. We add new titles and deals just about every day, so hooray for more reasons to look at your phone!

SIDES
• The return (and not a reboot) of Search for My Movies & My TV
• You can now watch trailers without signing in. Are you not entertained?!

EXTRA GRAVY
• On the TV season episode grid, we moved up the episode play button to align with the episode name. OCD much?
• Some movies and TV shows dated, got a little biz-zay and suddenly we had bundles with both movies and TV shows together running around. Dealing with these multi-format young’uns wasn’t easy. Do we put them in My Movies? Or My TV? A special section of their own? The politically correct answer is now both.
• The playback bar now shows when casting with the iPad Mini. It previously only did on larger iPads, but HR told us we couldn’t discriminate against small devices.
• Sometimes play buttons would show up on TV series you didn’t own. Gotcha! LOL. JK. Don’t be silly. It was just a bug. If it really played you would have heard about it on Slickdeals.
• In some cases, if you pressed play then quickly closed the player, then repeatedly did that, the audio would continue playing. You would not unlock a secret VUDU level or offer. This is not a Contra.
• Other improvements and fixes to download and playback.

EXCLUSIVE OFFERS
• Drop by your local Walmart and you may get exclusive, limited-time offers from VUDU on your iPhone. Keep an eye on your Notifications and don’t forget to have Location Services enabled for VUDU!
• Check out the ‘Only At Walmart’ link under My VUDU in the side menu to learn more

FIXED
• No more video and audio playback bugs when switching between apps
• Cast trailers to Chromecast devices, no account needed now

NEW BUGS
• Copywriter on vacation, which is why this section isn’t as entertaining as usual. Sorry #notsorry.

• Now for iPad! Drop by your local Walmart, you *may* get limited time offers from VUDU (eligibility dependent on location and supplies). Be sure to have Notifications and Location Services turned ON for the VUDU app.
• Updated Google Chromecast on the VUDU app to the latest version. "It’s a race! I hope I win!"

Issues? Crashes? Drop us a note at iosfeedback@vudu.com and please include device model and iOS version. Thanks!

BUG FIX: playback issue where an error popped up every 8~10 minutes. Thank you for your patience while we worked on solving it! The bug should be gone now, please contact us if it hasn't.

NEW: Do you want to Chromecast to a Vizio TV? If yes, check out this update!

Issues or crashes? Please drop us a note at **iosfeedback@vudu.com** and include device model and iOS version. Thanks!
BUG FIX: pre-order activation not starting despite movie being ready to watch

** NEW 3D Touch / Picture-in-Picture / Notification Settings **

• 3D Touch: need to quickly access My VUDU Movies + TV, or your Last Watched? Now do it directly from the VUDU app icon! Try it out on movie posters too!
• Picture-in-Picture for iPad: minimize the movie screen and do something else. Admit it, we all like to multitask.
• Push Notification Settings: under My VUDU >> Settings >> Push Notifications, select the offers and reminders that you'd like to receive. Remember, you must have notifications turned on to receive select offers.

3D Touch available on iPhone 6s / Picture-in-Picture available on iPad Mini, Air, Pro updated to iOS 9

As always, feel free to send the team feedback at iosfeedback@vudu.com

** NEW - free VUDU account sign-up **
• You can now directly sign-up for VUDU: watch select free episodes, trailers for upcoming movies, add movies to a Wishlist, and much more!
• Bug fix: disappearing downloads

As always, please send the team feedback at iosfeedback@vudu.com
Bug fixes

Improvements to sign-in experience
Bug fixes
NEW: Scan VUDU QR codes at your local Walmart to get early access to New Releases

version_name: 5.0 is here! Get more features and a richer experience with our latest and most robust Vudu app.  • HDX & Airplay

version_description: Bug fixes

**Upgrade your Entertainment**

Version 5.0 is here! Get more features and a richer experience with our latest and most robust Vudu app.

• HDX & Airplay, now available on your favorite titles
• Download rentals to watch offline and on the go
• Get physical - Blu-ray and DVD available in app
• Vudu exclusive in-movie experience with Extras+ (select titles)

• HDX & Airplay, now available on your favorite titles
• Download rentals to watch offline and on the go
• Get physical - Blu-ray and DVD available in app
• Vudu exclusive in-movie experience with Extras+ (select titles)

• Purchase movie merchandise, now available on select titles
• Blu-ray and DVDs for bundles
-- Bug fixes --

Get more control and extras with version 5.1!
- Parental controls: Create a PIN to lock purchases and content above specific Movie or TV ratings.
- Watching Sing? Rock out to Sing with Extras+ and get an immersive, in-movie experience filled with exclusive bonus scenes, fun facts and trivia, and interactive character and actor bios.
- Minor bug fixes and other magic.

**Introducing Mobile Disc to Digital – Convert from your phone!**
Use your mobile device to convert your Blu-ray and DVD discs into a digital movies! Upgrade your app and convert your collection today!

• It’s easy! Scan the UPC, convert with a click, and watch anytime, anywhere
• Conversions start at just $2; watch instantly
• Access your movies on any Vudu compatible device

Don’t have your UPC? Try Vudu To Go on your computer or laptop and convert with your disc.
Learn more at vudu.com/disc
• General bug fixes: We squished some bugs to improve overall performance.
• General bug fixes: We squished some bugs to improve overall performance.
General bug fixes: We squished some bugs to improve overall performance.

Enjoy more peace of mind and even more to love about Vudu with our new family-features:

• Common Sense Media – Parent-focused ratings/reviews by an independent and recognized organization.
• Parental Controls – Require a PIN for purchasing and/or viewing titles above a rating you choose.
• Kids Mode – Restrict browsing and viewing to age-appropriate titles from your collection.
• Family Play – Customize your viewing and skip past/mute strong scenes of objectionable content based on your preferences.

• Edge To Edge – We’ve brought support for the new iPad aspect ratio
• In A Pinch – Zoom in and zoom out with a pinch of your fingers.
More Offer Types – We’re adding new ways to give you offers! Keep an eye out!

We’re Newer and Bluer – Check out our newer, sleeker look!
HDX Downloads – Watch what you own offline, in the clarity of HDX (iOS10+)
iPhone X support – X marks the spot, and now we’ve added support for it
Pest Control – Lots of bug fixes for a smoother experience

Rental Downloads Notice - We’re rebuilding this feature and have temporarily disabled it until the next app update (Any downloaded rentals will be removed with this update)
Disc to Digital Notice – We are no longer supporting this feature in app.

Squished some more bugs
Fixed issues some users were experiencing with downloads

· General bug fixes
· DRM improvements - bug fixes and updates for a smoother downloading experience. Will require users with downloaded titles to remove and re-download them for viewing.

FFW & RW – Now it’s easier to get to the good parts. Hold down the new seek buttons and decide how long you want to fast forward or rewind.

iPhone X Updates – We look better on your device with support for the iPhone X screen and aspect ratio

Bug squishes – General bug fixes for a smoother experience

Navigate Faster – Get to your movies, and FREE movies, faster, thanks to our clean new look and navigation
Downloads Are Up – Rental downloads are back! (Available on devices with iOS 12 or above)
Bug Blocker – We’ve fixed a bunch of bugs. And by fixed, we mean exterminated.

Press on - Now you can double tap to play or pause, pan up or down to adjust the volume, pan left or right to fast forward or rewind, and pinch to zoom in and out.
Get more control - Based on feedback, we’ve increased the size of the playback controls
Menu cleanup – We’ve adjusted a few things to make navigation easier:
• “Watch” is now “My Vudu”
• Under “My Vudu” you’ll find “Library” (all your titles), “Downloads,” and “Offers”
• “Free Movies & TV” is shortened to “Free” and is now in the lower navigation

• Edge To Edge – We’ve brought support for the new iPad aspect ratio
• In A Pinch – Zoom in and zoom out with a pinch of your fingers.

• Edge To Edge – We’ve brought support for the new iPad aspect ratio
• In A Pinch – Zoom in and zoom out with a pinch of your fingers.

• System displayed downloads: See and remove downloaded titles directly from System Storage on your device. Find them at General > iPhone Storage > Vudu
• Closed Caption Display: Closed Caption will now display in your default iOS font. Go to the app settings to customize. Change your settings at General > Accessibility > Subtitles and Captioning

• Introducing Bingewatch! You can now binge watch all of your favorite TV shows with ease. When you’re done viewing an episode, you will be prompted to continue watching the following episode. Enjoying your TV shows has never been more seamless on Vudu!

INTRODUCING PICTURE IN PICTURE: Watch your favorite movie or TV show without interruption while multitasking on your iPhone.
INTRODUCING SPATIAL AUDIO: Experience movies and TV shows with theater-like surround sound using your AirPods Pro.

Watch from your home screen
